you_can_track_your_order_by_going_to_the: You can track your order by going to the Orders section in the menu. There you'll see all your active and past orders with real-time status updates.
how_do_i_cancel_my_order: How do I cancel my order?
you_can_cancel_your_order_from_the_order: You can cancel your order from the Order Details screen before it's confirmed by the restaurant. Once confirmed, please contact support for assistance.
we_accept_various_payment_methods_includ: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, digital wallets, cash on delivery, and wallet payment for your convenience.
delivery_time_varies_based_on_your_locat: Delivery time varies based on your location and restaurant availability. Estimated delivery times are shown when you place your order, typically ranging from 20-45 minutes.
can_i_change_my_delivery_address: Can I change my delivery address?
you_can_change_your_delivery_address_bef: You can change your delivery address before order confirmation. After the order is placed, please contact the restaurant or support immediately for assistance.
